page.title: 09The Cubs.
page.content: The 2nd Rugeley Cub Pack holds its meeting every Tuesday at Hillsprings Community Centre from 6.00pm to 7.45pm. We have a pack of 30 cubs aged between 8 and 11 years. They take part in plenty of outdoor activities. In the last 12 months we have taken the cubs to London and there we visited the Imperial War Museum and after we went aboard H.M.S.Belfast which was on the River Thames. In the Summer the cubs hadan outdoor camp at Beaudesert Camp on part of Cannock Chase for the weekend. A Winter's camp was held in February at Drum Hill in Derby. It was an indoor camp and all the cubs achieved their Artist Badge that weekend. In June the cubs went again to Beaudesert Camp for a weekend. The cubs also take part in District Competitions Athletics, Cooking, Handicraft an Intersix Quiz and have a football team.
